description:
Today I happened to run the misspelling check against nova, and found that the misspelled words are creeping to nova again. 

Tried to add a tox target for misspelling checks, but later realized that misspelling would report false error. Seems we can't add that tox target until we enhance the misspellings to support excluding certain text.
title: misspelling words in nova

comments.content: Today I happened to run the misspelling check against nova, and found that the misspelled words are creeping to nova again. I'm suggesting we add a new tox target for that kind of check
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lianhao-lu
